Name: The Roadrunner
Ingredients: 60 ml Patrón Reposado tequila infused with vanilla
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Citrus and tequila with a hint of maple and vanilla, smoothed with egg white.
History: Discovered in 2005 at The Cuckoo Club, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Roadrunner contains 199 calories
